entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 2:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -16.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 40 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -26.6°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
